views.title: Download TikTok Videos and many other enhancements!

views.markdown:
Unicorn is the only tweak you'll need for TikTok!

### For You

 - Download Videos
- Following Page enhancements
- Hide all buttons and text views for all videos**
- Comment more than 90 characters for all videos
- Present the download button in For You page**
- Pinch to zoom and rotation gestures for videos
- Perform all share actions

### 

### User

-  Download User's Profile Image
- Show date created for all videos
- View Private or Under Review videos
- Spoof Following, Fan and Hearts stats**
- Display the region for all Users
- Display User's birthday, age and video upload count
- Sort user's videos by Likes in descending order
- Sort user's Liked videos in descending order

### 

### Other

-  LIVE enhancements**
- View extra user info for all members in Live streams
- Type more than 50 characters in Live Chats
- Display all gift prizes in Live streams
- Disable marking profiles as seen
- Upload videos up to 10 min. length
- Removed TikTok Ads

### 

**  = Long Press for 1 second
<small style="color: #aaa; font-size: 8pt;">Hello TikTok, we should chat ðŸ‘»</small><style>body { text-align: center; }</style>

- Display Following Count for **Who Viewed Your Profile** Page
- Auto scroll videos feature

- Fixed crash when tapping your own profile
- Fixed issue where Draft videos prevented sorting
- View videos marked as **Friends Only**

- Fixed crash when tapping your own profile in LIVE Streams.
- Download User's default image
- Added timestamp for **LIVE** streams
- Filter videos by double tapping anywhere in the Profile View
- Fixed issue where videos were paused due to Ads
- Works with the latest TikTok version

**NOTE:** Works with TikTok v10.0.0
- Complete redesign for Unicorn settings
- Upload videos up to 10 min. length
- Disable marking profiles as seen
- View extra user Info for all members in **LIVE** streams
- Pinch to zoom and rotation gestures for videos
- This update includes enhancements to the **For You** page and performance improvements to make your tweak experience even better!
- This update includes enhancements to the **Following** and performance improvements to make your tweak experience even better!

Tested on TikTok version 9.6.2 - 9.7
- Download Videos
- Download User's Profile Image
- **LIVE** enhancements (long Press screen for 1 second)
- Type more than 50 characters in live streams
- **Following** page enhancements (long Press screen for 1 second)
- Display all gift prizes in live streams
- Show date created to each video in **LIKED** feed
- Display all user's birthday and the date the account was made in user's profile view
- View **Private** or **Under review** videos in LIKED feed.
